page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT CHARACTERISTICS 1
page.content: From the information collected from a sample of 55 people in the Lymm area ,48 of them are engaged in full time employment.13% of the sample are either retired or unemployed. The majority of people questioned are employed by some form of privately owned company.As expected,most people work for larger firms than smaller firms.Interestingly,a high percentage,21%,are self employed.Only a small number of people work in the public sector(7%). The dominant occupation in this area is management as over 33% of our sample have been engaged in it.17% of the people have professional occupations and 6% are skilled technicians.20% of the sampled people are labourers or semi_skilled workers.8% work in the retail business and 11% are employed by the NHS
